text:
In the "prg: External Rewriting Program" section of the "Using RewriteMap" page, it would be helpful to include a reminder that "Running external rewrite maps without defining a RewriteLock is DANGEROUS!".  I didn't initially notice the warning in the log files and it took me a while to find out about RewriteLock.

Thanks!
creator: tsteiner@nerdclub.net
rbowen@apache.org
text: Fixed in 2.2. Note that in trunk, and in 2.4, the RewriteLock directive has gone away, so this is not relevant there.
